bugs.summary: Check for large ArrayBuffers or views in WebIDL bindings
Perma [tier 2] xorig editor/libeditor/tests/test_bug629172.html | reftest comparison: == <textarea dir="ltr"> after second Accel+Shift+X <textarea dir="ltr">
Speculative loader should respect the `media` attribute of the <link> tag
Audit JSAPI and add jsapi-tests for large ArrayBuffers
Textarea padding crops text to the content box in the block direction, unlike other browsers.
With CSS property "font-family: serif", non-CJK lang attributes causes fonts fallback to sans-serif fonts
Add ability and prefs to enable CET Strict Mode in sandboxed child processes.
Consider removing the padding special-case for <input type=number>
Non-native theme buttons could be a bit larger
Intermittent xul/treetwisty-svg-context-paint-1.xhtml == xul/treetwisty-svg-context-paint-1-ref.xhtml | image comparison, max difference: 1, number of differing pixels: 1
`DOMWillOpenModalDialog` does not send event detail when new the tab modal UI is opened for content modals
IOUtils.makeDirectory does not handle the case of calling it with a root directory
Avoid notifying empty events to listener.
